title: The City - James Herbert [Ultra Rare]
description:
The City
                                - James Herbert -

In the aftermath of MankindÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s final war
the few survivors scratch an existence
from the ruins.

This  is no brave new world.
From the shattered fragments of  a once great civilization crawl the rats ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ to
claim the domain as their  own. 
The City and its pitiful human inhabitants finally belong  to them. The people have become prey, the hunters the hunted.

But now the traveller has arrived and he is no victim.
In search of his past, he has come to take back the dream of life
as it was before.

But in the city the only dreams left are nightmares.

---------------------------------------------------------------------
InFo:
Released in 1994 this graphic novel is now out of print and 
is now hard to come by.

It took me a while to track down a copy of this graphic novel and 
here it finally is!
The scans of each page are of high quality, so no worries there.
Please note pages one and two are missing, BUT they do not 
contain any of the story! 

Also if you are into audiobooks you can find The Rats Trilogy, 
complete and unabridged, here: <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4286061" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4286061</a>


Ohh yea and i have also included a copy of CDisplay, comic reader with this 
download.
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Enjoy and Please Seed when you finish the download!
